overview: A troubled young woman whose father is in prison for wickedly violating her as a child grabs the chance at a new beginning when she meets a charming young man at a modeling shoot, however it is not the fresh start that she had hoped for. Starring Michael Godson, Tina Mba, Bassey Ekpeyong-|yang, Scarlet Shotade, Oge Peters.
title: The Demon In Me
